intro: Justicia hansenii, commonly known as Hansen's glorybower, is a flowering plant native to Mexico. It belongs to the Acanthaceae family and is characterized by its striking, showy inflorescences. The plant features opposite, lance-shaped leaves and produces vibrant red or orange tubular flowers. It is often cultivated for its ornamental value in gardens and landscapes. Justicia hansenii thrives in full sun to partial shade and prefers well-drained soil.
